prj1.TXTEditor

Class discCommunicationAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • prj1.TXTEditor.discCommunicationAccess

  • public class discCommunicationAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides communication from/to the disk(writes and reads from the disk by converting bytes to tuples and reverse)
    Author:
    ip
